title: Places people live: the family farm
creator_credit: Richard S. Jackson and William Claiborne Incorporated
brief_description: Contrasts the way of life on small farms in Denmark and Yugoslavia. The Danish farm is highly mechanised and we are shown jobs, animals and buildings. In Yugoslavia, the farm is smaller, unmechanised and involves different activities. Suitable for middle and upper primary and lower secondary levels.
